scripts.config: pnpm --filter '@hikers-book/config' run config && pnpm --filter=!'@hikers-book/config' run config:all
scripts.changelog: conventional-changelog -p conventionalcommits -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.ci:version: pnpm changelog && pnpm changeset version && pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && git add .
